citation.name: Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U.S.A.
citation.title: Crystal structure of human junctional adhesion molecule 1: implications for reovirus binding.

comment.text: Seems to play a role in epithelial tight junction formation. Appears early in primordial forms of cell junctions and recruits PARD3 (PubMed:11489913). The association of the PARD6-PARD3 complex may prevent the interaction of PARD3 with JAM1, thereby preventing tight junction assembly (By similarity). Plays a role in regulating monocyte transmigration involved in integrity of epithelial barrier (By similarity). Ligand for integrin alpha-L/beta-2 involved in memory T-cell and neutrophil transmigration (PubMed:11812992). Involved in platelet activation (PubMed:10753840).
(Microbial infection) Acts as a receptor for Mammalian reovirus sigma-1.
(Microbial infection) Acts as a receptor for Human Rotavirus strain Wa.

Interacts with the ninth PDZ domain of MPDZ (PubMed:11489913). Interacts with the first PDZ domain of PARD3 (PubMed:11489913). The association between PARD3 and PARD6B probably disrupts this interaction (By similarity). Interacts with ITGAL (via I-domain) (PubMed:15528364).
(Microbial infection) Interacts with Mammalian reovirus sigma-1 capsid protein.
(Microbial infection) Interacts with Human Rotavirus strain Wa vp4 capsid protein.
Localized at tight junctions of both epithelial and endothelial cells.
Expressed in endothelium, epithelium and leukocytes (at protein level).
The Ig-like V-type 2 domain is necessary and sufficient for interaction with integrin alpha-L/beta-2.

property.value: Cell surface interactions at the vascular wall
TGF-beta receptor signaling in EMT (epithelial to mesenchymal transition)
Expressed in ectocervix and 172 other tissues
P:negative regulation of stress fiber assembly
P:positive regulation of establishment of endothelial barrier
P:positive regulation of Rho protein signal transduction
P:protein localization to bicellular tight junction
P:regulation of bicellular tight junction assembly
P:transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

entry.keyword: Host cell receptor for virus entry
